Detailed Description

Controls the play table for a game.

table properties: width is left to right and is first index on positions.
height is near to far and is the second index.
so positions[0][0] is the lowerleft corner and positions[width-1][height-1] is the upper right corner.

Definition at line 18 of file cPlayTable.h.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

cPlayTable::cPlayTable ( int  width = 3,
int  height = 7 
)

Constructor.

The width and height currently have to be 3 and 7 since the game is not flexible enough yet for other values.
